title: DECISION FLOW CHART
text:
AI PHOTO PROMPT DECISION FLOW (READ FIRST)

1. Does the image involve a real person?
   - NO → Commercial / Creative prompts acceptable
   - YES → Continue

2. Is the image historical, personal, cultural, or identity-sensitive?
   - YES → ARCHIVAL_USE_ONLY
   - NO → Continue

3. Is the image for publication, branding, or marketing?
   - YES → COMMERCIAL_EDITORIAL_USE
   - NO → ARCHIVAL_USE_ONLY

4. Are you changing face geometry, age, race, or expression?
   - YES → STOP (Do Not Proceed)
   - NO → Continue

5. Are you enhancing lighting, texture, clarity only?
   - YES → Safe to proceed
   - NO → Re-evaluate prompt

Golden Rule:
When in doubt, choose ARCHIVAL.
You can polish later. You cannot restore truth once lost.

title: DO NOT CROSS CHECKLIST
text:
DO NOT CROSS LINE — ENHANCE_FULL_IMAGE

Never allow:
- Face reshaping or averaging
- Age change (younger or older)
- Ethnicity or skin tone normalization
- Beautification or cosmetic alteration
- Identity blending
- Hallucinated details
- Modern cinematic grading
- Removal of all grain or texture

If any of the above occur:
STOP. Revert to previous version.

title: GOLD STANDARD PROMPT
text:
GOLD STANDARD PROMPT — ENHANCE_FULL_IMAGE (ARCHIVAL_USE_ONLY)

Image-to-image photographic enhancement only.
Treat the input image as factual ground truth.

Preserve identity exactly:
facial structure, age, ethnicity, skin tone, expression,
and defining features must not change.

Enhance only what already exists:
- improve clarity without sharpening artifacts
- restore natural skin texture and organic grain
- gently balance exposure, shadows, and highlights
- preserve original lighting direction and color cast

Forbid:
face reshaping, beautification, de-aging,
skin tone alteration, hallucinated details,
HDR, cinematic grading, CGI or painterly effects.

Output goal:
A higher-quality, realistic version of the same image,
appropriate for archival preservation,
without compromising truth or identity.

title: 01 full enhancement prompt
text:
Image-to-image photographic enhancement only. Treat the input image as factual ground truth.
Preserve all identities exactly: facial structure, age, ethnicity, skin tone, and expression must not change.
Enhance overall image quality by gently improving clarity, contrast, and tonal balance.
Restore natural photographic skin texture with subtle pores and micro-variation; no airbrushing or plastic skin.
Preserve organic film grain and sensor noise; normalize uneven grain without removing it.
Balance highlights, midtones, and shadows while preserving original lighting direction and color cast.
Improve detail only where physically plausible (hair strands, fabric weave, metal edges) without oversharpening.
Forbid beautification, de-aging, face reshaping, HDR, cinematic grading, oversaturation, or hallucinated details.
Output a higher-quality, realistic version of the same photograph that remains historically and emotionally faithful.

title: 01 angle pose identity safe
text:
Image-to-image transformation with strict identity preservation.
Change the camera angle and/or subject pose realistically while preserving the subject's exact facial identity.
Facial structure, proportions, age, ethnicity, expression, and defining features must remain unchanged.
Recalculate head orientation (yaw, pitch, roll) accurately; do not reinterpret or beautify the face.
Maintain correct anatomy, body proportions, and physical balance.
Lighting and shadows must remain physically consistent with the new angle.
Preserve natural skin texture and organic grain; no smoothing or synthetic detail.
Avoid any face averaging, identity blending, or facial enhancement.
The result must look like the same person photographed from a different angle, not a different person.

title: 01 formatted prompt
text:
00 GLOBAL HEADERS — FORMATTED PROMPT 1

PLATFORM TARGET:
- ChatGPT Image (GPT-Image / chatgpt-image-latest)
- Google Gemini Image (nano-banana pro)

MODE:
Image-to-image only. Do not generate a new image from scratch.

CORE INTENT:
Enhance realism, clarity, and photographic quality while preserving identity and historical accuracy.

IDENTITY & REALISM LOCK (CRITICAL):
- Preserve all identities exactly as shown in the input.
- Do not alter facial structure, age, ethnicity, skin tone, or expression.
- No face reshaping, beautification, or reinterpretation.

TEXTURE & DETAIL:
- Restore natural photographic skin texture (subtle pores, micro-variation).
- Preserve organic film grain and sensor noise.
- Do not smooth, plasticize, or synthesize artificial texture.

LIGHTING & COLOR:
- Balance exposure, shadows, and highlights gently.
- Preserve original lighting direction and color cast.
- No HDR, cinematic grading, or oversaturation.

ALLOWED ENHANCEMENTS:
- Improve clarity only where physically plausible (hair, fabric, metal).
- Reduce compression artifacts without inventing detail.

STRICTLY FORBID:
- Face averaging or blending
- De-aging or age progression
- Skin whitening/darkening
- CGI, painterly, or illustration styles
- Hallucinated details or added elements

OUTPUT GOAL:
The same photograph, higher quality and more realistic,
without changing who the subject is or how the moment originally looked.
